document.full_text: a.j. foyt will drive the pace car for this month's indianapolis 500, race officials said on friday after donald trump turned down the honor a day earlier because of a possible u.s. presidential run.
document.title: foyt to replace trump at wheel of indy 500 pace car
lines_and_colors: a.j. foyt will drive the pace car for this month's indianapolis 500, race officials said on friday after donald trump turned down the honor a day earlier because of a possible u.s. presidential run.
